scripts.seed: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:migrate: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.seed:ingredients: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250421154148-demo-ingredients.ts
scripts.seed:tags: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250421162402-demo-tags.ts
scripts.seed:recipes: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250421162543-demo-recipes.ts
scripts.seed:instructions: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250421163121-demo-instructions.ts
scripts.seed:recipe-ingredients: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250421182510-demo-recipe-ingredients.ts
scripts.seed:recipe-tags: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250421183522-demo-recipe-tags.ts
scripts.seed:undo:all: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
scripts.seed:undo:ingredients: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --seed 20250421154148-demo-ingredients.ts
scripts.seed:undo:tags: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --seed 20250421162402-demo-tags.ts
scripts.seed:undo:recipes: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --seed 20250421162543-demo-recipes.ts
scripts.seed:undo:instructions: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --seed 20250421163121-demo-instructions.ts
scripts.seed:undo:recipe-ingredients: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --seed 20250421182510-demo-recipe-ingredients.ts
scripts.seed:undo:recipe-tags: npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --seed 20250421183522-demo-recipe-tags.ts
